title: [Book News] Concept Art Gives Us A Different Look At Marvel's 'Avengers: Infinity War'
body:
Over the course of developing a movie, lots of changes are made. Characters are added, dropped, or have their roles changed; plot points are moved around until they make the best sense; and characters go through changes in regards to their wardrobe and what weaponry they use.

All of that is certainly true in the case of Avengers: Infinity War. Marvel’sAvengers: Infinity War – The Art of the…

summary: All I Have 8
title: All I Have 8
body:
Pairing: Biker!Peter Parker x Reader

**Reminder: I write ANDREW GARFIELD as my Peter Parker **

Warnings: Language. Parental abuse. Arranged marriage. Shitty parent. I Guess Boarder line cheating. Lying. Secrets. Sneaking around.

Your daddy has a plan for you. He’s a strict man, with a belt and gun. You know better than to stray from the path, from the rules he set out for you. You’re promised to a good man,but not much of a man. Secretly your hear beats for bad boy, biker Peter Parker. He’s been hounding you for a date, a ride on his motorcycle, for one word; yes. You keep turning him down, because if your daddy finds out about Peter, he’ll kill the both of you. But Peter isn’t backing down that easy. He knows what you want and he’ll get that yes.

He sips his water slowly, watching the opening of the old barn they used for fights. A ring in the center, and lots of space around for watchers. It was off the beaten path, like the clubhouse so nobody could hear them from the road. He leans against one of the posts, waiting, watching.

“A watched pot never boils.” Tony grins coming to a stop next to him. Peter smirks, rolling his eyes.

“Okay, Aunt May.” He snorts.

“Still not here?” Howie, his brother asks coming to a lean on the same post.

“There’s still time.” Peter nods.

“You need your head in the fight. Clear thinking.” Clint gives the coach prep talk to him.

“I’m always clear thinking.” Peter smirks.

“Yeah?” Sam folds his arms over his chest. “So the stunt you pulled with Jesse. Clear thinking?” Sam cocks his brow. Peter’s head drops back, as the three other men erupt at the same time.

“WHAT?”

“My smartest move so far.” He shrugs. “He grabbed her. Hard.” He pins Sam with a look.

“Christ Bro.” Howie shakes his head a faint smile on his lips.

“You’re a mess, boy.” Tony chuckles, slapping him on the shoulder.

“The hell are you going to do when she’s married? Pregnant?” Clint snorts. Peter’s gaze snapped over to his friend.

“Won’t make it to the alter, boys. She wants to be with me. And she will never carry his babies.” Peter glares at Clint.

“All this for one girl?” Howie sighs.

“Sam, you get it. If it was Red?” Peter looks at Sam who scraps a dark skinned hand over his face.

“I mean, I can’t say I was much better. Instead of her daddy, we were worried about her brother.” Sam shrugs.

“Speaking of,” Tony smirks, his eyes watching Red move through the crowd.
She wore cut off shorts and a tank top, her red hair pulled up on top of her head. Her arm was stretched out behind as if she was pulling someone along.

“I knew it!” Peter punches Howie in the chest as excitement burst through his own.

“Why’s he punch me?” Howie grumbles, rubbing his chest.

“Told you she wants me.” Peter grins, moving through the guys. He was normally, cool, bad ass, unaffected, but two years of work. He was as excited as a child on Christmas.

He jogs towards her, before she can see him coming, his hands capture the back of her thighs, lifting her up. Her legs go around his waist as she gives a surprised giggle. Her hands move from his shoulders, up the back of his neck and into his hair. His hands support her weight, keeping her close to him, unbothered people were watching them as she grinned down at him.

“You came. I knew it.” He grins at her. “I could feel it.”

“Peter.” She giggles.

“Darlin’?” His eyes move down her. She wore a little grey halter top, it tied around her neck and stopped at her belly button, she had on little cut off shorts and if he had to guess the same sneakers she normally wore. The top half of her hair was pulled up, the rest hanging over her naked shoulders.

“Show me your world.” She nods, grinning. “But I have a few questions for you after your fight.”

“Welcome to my world Darlin’ and I’ll answer anything you want.” He agrees, still holding her up.

“Convince me to say yes Peter Parker.” She smirks, he has to resist the urge to kiss her. He sets her down, grabbing her hand, he tugs her after him with a grin on his face.





“Y/N.” Peter pulls you in front of him, his one hand rests on your hip, his chest to your back. “This is my father. Tony.” You could hear the grin in his voice.

“My, my, now he never said you were this stunning.” Tony grins. He’s got dark hair cut short, starting to grey around the edges and a scruffy goatee that’s starting to grey as well. You laugh, Peter sighs loudly, Tony takes your hand, pulling you away from Peter. He gives you a slow spin, before he shakes his head. “Nope, sorry too good for my boy.” He chuckles.

“Shut up old man.” Peter smirks, pulling you back towards him.

“She could upgrade.” Howie folds his arms grinning down at you. He looks like Peter, though they aren’t blood related. You can see he looks like a younger Tony with brown hair, and pretty eyes.

“I wouldn’t call that upgrading Howard.” You snort.

“That’s my girl.” Peter chuckles, his arm coming down over your shoulders.

“Thought you were a nice girl, Y/N?” Howie grins.

“Really? I mean I let your brother practically assault me on a regular, doesn’t really scream good girl.” You snort.

“It’s not assault if you like it.” Peter shakes his head.

“Lord, tell me he’s paying you?” Another man grins, coming to a stop in the little group.

“Fuck off Buck.” Peter gives him a playful push. He’s got shaggy black hair, pulled back in a small bun, winter blue eyes give off the charming and friendly vibe.

“What’s my line again?” You look up at Peter. The guys around you laugh, a few high five, Peter smirks at you.

“I swear Darlin’.” He shakes his slowly.

“I know, I know. You’re scary and lethal, like a kitten.” You nod grinning at him.

“What happened to the sweet girl I was seeing?” Peter gives you a squeeze closer to him.

“Didn’t you say it yourself, I’m not really a nice girl.” You shrug.

“Killin’ me Darlin’.” He grins.

“Peter!” Someone yells from the side of the ring. Peter nods, his hand not wrapped around you lashes out, grabbing Howie by the front of his T-shirt.

“Watch her. Or I’ll break your jaw and tell mom you wrecked her car sophomore year.” Peter threatens his brother.

“I don’t need a sitter, Parker.” You fold your arms over your chest. Peter looks you over, he licks his lips and turns towards the guys again.

“You’re right, Buck. You’re married, keep Howie and anyone else away from her.” He nods.

“Hey!” You and Howie exclaim together.

“Got it.” Buck laughs, patting Peter on the shoulder, while giving him a shove forward.

“I’ll be back. Stay with Buck. I’m serious Y/N.” Peter points a finger at you as he walks backwards towards the ring. “We can fight about it after, just listen this time.” He smirks. Your mouth opens but you shut it, when Buck lifts a brow at you.

“Fine, I’ll behave this once.” You roll your eyes, waving your hand at him. You hear his laugh as he disappears in the crowd.

“Oh you’re going to keep him on his toes.” Tony grins at you.

“You’re right, Buck. You’re married, keep Howie and anyone else away from her.” He nods.

“Hey!” You and Howie exclaim together.

“Got it.” Buck laughs, patting Peter on the shoulder, while giving him a shove forward.

“I’ll be back. Stay with Buck. I’m serious Y/N.” Peter points a finger at you as he walks backwards towards the ring. “We can fight about it after, just listen this time.” He smirks. Your mouth opens but you shut it, when Buck lifts a brow at you.

trail.content_raw:
Pairing: Biker!Peter Parker x Reader

**Reminder: I write ANDREW GARFIELD as my Peter Parker **

Warnings: Language. Parental abuse. Arranged marriage. Shitty parent. I Guess Boarder line cheating. Lying. Secrets. Sneaking around.

Your daddy has a plan for you. He’s a strict man, with a belt and gun. You know better than to stray from the path, from the rules he set out for you. You’re promised to a good man,but not much of a man. Secretly your hear beats for bad boy, biker Peter Parker. He’s been hounding you for a date, a ride on his motorcycle, for one word; yes. You keep turning him down, because if your daddy finds out about Peter, he’ll kill the both of you. But Peter isn’t backing down that easy. He knows what you want and he’ll get that yes.

[[MORE]]

He sips his water slowly, watching the opening of the old barn they used for fights. A ring in the center, and lots of space around for watchers. It was off the beaten path, like the clubhouse so nobody could hear them from the road. He leans against one of the posts, waiting, watching.

“A watched pot never boils.” Tony grins coming to a stop next to him. Peter smirks, rolling his eyes.

“Okay, Aunt May.” He snorts.

“Still not here?” Howie, his brother asks coming to a lean on the same post.

“There’s still time.” Peter nods.

“You need your head in the fight. Clear thinking.” Clint gives the coach prep talk to him.

“I’m always clear thinking.” Peter smirks.

“Yeah?” Sam folds his arms over his chest. “So the stunt you pulled with Jesse. Clear thinking?” Sam cocks his brow. Peter’s head drops back, as the three other men erupt at the same time.

“WHAT?”

“My smartest move so far.” He shrugs. “He grabbed her. Hard.” He pins Sam with a look.

“Christ Bro.” Howie shakes his head a faint smile on his lips.

“You’re a mess, boy.” Tony chuckles, slapping him on the shoulder.

“The hell are you going to do when she’s married? Pregnant?” Clint snorts. Peter’s gaze snapped over to his friend.

“Won’t make it to the alter, boys. She wants to be with me. And she will never carry his babies.” Peter glares at Clint.

“All this for one girl?” Howie sighs.

“Sam, you get it. If it was Red?” Peter looks at Sam who scraps a dark skinned hand over his face.

“I mean, I can’t say I was much better. Instead of her daddy, we were worried about her brother.” Sam shrugs.

“Speaking of,” Tony smirks, his eyes watching Red move through the crowd.
She wore cut off shorts and a tank top, her red hair pulled up on top of her head. Her arm was stretched out behind as if she was pulling someone along.

“I knew it!” Peter punches Howie in the chest as excitement burst through his own.

“Why’s he punch me?” Howie grumbles, rubbing his chest.

“Told you she wants me.” Peter grins, moving through the guys. He was normally, cool, bad ass, unaffected, but two years of work. He was as excited as a child on Christmas.

He jogs towards her, before she can see him coming, his hands capture the back of her thighs, lifting her up. Her legs go around his waist as she gives a surprised giggle. Her hands move from his shoulders, up the back of his neck and into his hair. His hands support her weight, keeping her close to him, unbothered people were watching them as she grinned down at him.

“You came. I knew it.” He grins at her. “I could feel it.”

“Peter.” She giggles.

“Darlin’?” His eyes move down her. She wore a little grey halter top, it tied around her neck and stopped at her belly button, she had on little cut off shorts and if he had to guess the same sneakers she normally wore. The top half of her hair was pulled up, the rest hanging over her naked shoulders.

“Show me your world.” She nods, grinning. “But I have a few questions for you after your fight.”

“Welcome to my world Darlin’ and I’ll answer anything you want.” He agrees, still holding her up.

“Convince me to say yes Peter Parker.” She smirks, he has to resist the urge to kiss her. He sets her down, grabbing her hand, he tugs her after him with a grin on his face.





“Y/N.” Peter pulls you in front of him, his one hand rests on your hip, his chest to your back. “This is my father. Tony.” You could hear the grin in his voice.

“My, my, now he never said you were this stunning.” Tony grins. He’s got dark hair cut short, starting to grey around the edges and a scruffy goatee that’s starting to grey as well. You laugh, Peter sighs loudly, Tony takes your hand, pulling you away from Peter. He gives you a slow spin, before he shakes his head. “Nope, sorry too good for my boy.” He chuckles.

“Shut up old man.” Peter smirks, pulling you back towards him.

“She could upgrade.” Howie folds his arms grinning down at you. He looks like Peter, though they aren’t blood related. You can see he looks like a younger Tony with brown hair, and pretty eyes.

“I wouldn’t call that upgrading Howard.” You snort.

“That’s my girl.” Peter chuckles, his arm coming down over your shoulders.

“Thought you were a nice girl, Y/N?” Howie grins.

“Really? I mean I let your brother practically assault me on a regular, doesn’t really scream good girl.” You snort.

“It’s not assault if you like it.” Peter shakes his head.

“Lord, tell me he’s paying you?” Another man grins, coming to a stop in the little group.

“Fuck off Buck.” Peter gives him a playful push. He’s got shaggy black hair, pulled back in a small bun, winter blue eyes give off the charming and friendly vibe.

“What’s my line again?” You look up at Peter. The guys around you laugh, a few high five, Peter smirks at you.

“I swear Darlin’.” He shakes his slowly.

“I know, I know. You’re scary and lethal, like a kitten.” You nod grinning at him.

“What happened to the sweet girl I was seeing?” Peter gives you a squeeze closer to him.

“Didn’t you say it yourself, I’m not really a nice girl.” You shrug.

“Killin’ me Darlin’.” He grins.

“Peter!” Someone yells from the side of the ring. Peter nods, his hand not wrapped around you lashes out, grabbing Howie by the front of his T-shirt.

“Watch her. Or I’ll break your jaw and tell mom you wrecked her car sophomore year.” Peter threatens his brother.

“I don’t need a sitter, Parker.” You fold your arms over your chest. Peter looks you over, he licks his lips and turns towards the guys again.

“You’re right, Buck. You’re married, keep Howie and anyone else away from her.” He nods.

“Hey!” You and Howie exclaim together.

“Got it.” Buck laughs, patting Peter on the shoulder, while giving him a shove forward.

“I’ll be back. Stay with Buck. I’m serious Y/N.” Peter points a finger at you as he walks backwards towards the ring. “We can fight about it after, just listen this time.” He smirks. Your mouth opens but you shut it, when Buck lifts a brow at you.

“Fine, I’ll behave this once.” You roll your eyes, waving your hand at him. You hear his laugh as he disappears in the crowd.

“Oh you’re going to keep him on his toes.” Tony grins at you.

summary: Cool Kids 22
title: Cool Kids 22
body:
Pairing: Steve Rogers x Reader!Castle

Warning: Violence. Wish of dying. Mentions of assault. Fighting. Violent past. Stabbing. Hostile anger. Dislike for being touched. Mentions of death. Breaking laws. Revenge/Payback. Defiance in school.

Characters: Steve Rogers. Bucky Barnes. Sam Wilson. Becca Barnes. Frank Castle. Luke Cage. Matt Murdock. Mary MacPherran. Amora Lorelei. Wanda Maximoff. Kaine Parker. Peter Parker. Ben Reilly.
[if you have questions about who some of these Characters are, feel free to ask]

(Half way through I removed the synopsis as it’s longer and annoying to copy over after this long)

Tag List Is Open!!

Make Sure You Read The Warning. Things get ugly from here on out. If you’re not ready for, Mentions of assault. Violence. Or vulgar sexual suggestion.
Stop reading here please and thank you.
Understand this is going to carry on through the rest of the series.

The Jeep ride to Barnes Grounds was tense. Steve gripped the wheel tightly, Bec’s didn’t speak, Sam sat in the far back, and Nat had her head on Buck’s shoulder. You adjust your glasses, looking back at your Crew.

“We go to Frank with anything he tells us. Kaine is getting out of hand, he’s going to have to be put down.” You nod. Everyone nods.

“Anyone else having a hard time taking Y/N serious with those magnify glasses on her face?” Sam asks, a faint smirk on his lips. You see Steve chuckle silently, Bec’s hand slips over her mouth, Nat giggles and Buck grins.

“Fuck off. I can’t get my contacts in.” You sigh.

“You look like Steve Urkel’s girlfriend.” Sam chuckles.

“Fuck off.” You shot back turning back around. Steve glances over at you, his lips pressed together as if he was trying to not laugh. You glare at him.

“Careful those things catch the light just right and she’ll fry your ass like an ant on the sidewalk.” Buck laughs. You sigh, throwing up a hand, shaking your head.

“This is why I got contacts.” You mutter.

“I don’t know, she reminds me of one of those hot, nerdy girls. Like she could outwit your ass and break your jaw.” Nat smirks.

“Agreed.” Steve snorts.

“Yeah, remember that Wilson.” You turn glaring at him.

“PFS.” Sam winks at you, you roll your eyes.

“PFS?” Buck looks between the two of you.

“Pretty Fucking Sexy. Or Smart.” Sam shrugs, a goofy grin on his lips. Steve snorts quietly as you turn back around.

“Love you too Sammy.” You shake your head.



You agreed to split up and stash away, so Ben didn’t find all of you sitting in the living room waiting for him. Limiting his chances of bailing or not showing up. Steve hand rested on your hip, as he led you towards the hallway off the kitchen. It put the two of you completely out of view, but the best advancing position.

There was something different in the way Steve touched you. There was more behind it, it meant more between the two of you. He was more protective of you now, whether it was the jumping or the truth about Kaine coming out. He moved as you moved, and he wasn’t far from touching distance unless forced farther.
You lean against one side of the hallway, Steve was leaning across from you.

Blue eyes watched all your movements, you rolled the sleeves on the flannel you wore, you were more or less drowning in material. Steve smirks, something told you he was enjoying watching you in his clothes. But there was something in those blue eyes, something heated, something and it made your knee press together as the throbbing in your belly grew.

“What?” You rasp, watching him, unable to look away. Nerves wrecked your body, this was different for you and Steve, you didn’t get nervous, or shy. Not with your best friend, your partner in crime, your Crew member.

Steve’s eyes cut to the end of the hall. He pushes off the wall, stepping into your personal space. Trapping you between him and the wall. But you didn’t feel trapped, it felt right, you liked it. His head dips before you really could brace yourself. His lips catch yours, his hands slip into your hair. Your hands land on his chest, fingers gripping his T-shirt. Fuck needing pain pills, Steve kissing you made your body numb, you’d never felt such a rush before.

“Why,” you pant when Steve pulls back with a smirk “have we not done that before?” You smirk, flushing.

“You weren’t ready.” Steve brushes a thumb over your cheek.

True, but boy were you ready now.

“You know,” you swallow.

“We have to tell them. I know.” He nods. Your hand reaches up, snatching the ball cap off his head, you flip it around and place it over your messy pink hair. You brush up against him as you move by, he lets out a faint chuckle.

“What?” You glance back.

“Defiantly mine.” He nods, flashing that crooked grin at you.

“Same.” You smirk, your eyes run over him. His black T-shirt and jeans, he was your best friend, but he was more. The two of you knew that, it was clear now, and you’d have to face the Crew with what you were now.

“He’s here.” Bec’s speaks softly in the living room. You nod, turning to face the entrance of the hall. Steve comes over, standing next to you. The door opens, you heard Bec’s suck in a breathe.

“Hey.” Ben sounds cheerful. “You okay?” He stops not far from you and Steve.

“I’m sorry.” Bec’s sniffs. You nod, Steve moves, storming out of the hall.

“Wha-” Ben’s cut off as Steve’s hand closes around his throat, backing him into a wall.

“You’ve got a bit of explaining to do.” Steve growls. You walk out from the hall, into the living room.

“Hello Ben.” You stop once in the living room. Ben’s eyes grow wide, you’d not bothered with make up at the hospital. The guys agreed, yours and Nat’s beating was on him too, he needed to see it all.

“Fuck.” Ben croaks.

“Yes you are.” Buck slides around the corner on his shoulder. Ben swallows hard, his eyes flick around Sam pulls a chair with him, turning it around. Steve drops Ben into it, Buck comes to stand on the other side of Ben, Steve on the other. Nat strolls into the living room, joining the party.

“You just have to tell them what you know.” Bec’s nods, her nose red and eyes blood shot.

“Spill what you know, and they’ll let you go.” Nat nods, sitting down in an arm chair, dramatically crossing her legs.

“Maybe.” Buck growls, his grip on Ben’s shoulder tightens.

“We’ll see.” Steve folds his arms over his chest. “Start singing bird.” His jaw clenches.

“What do you want to know?” Ben swallows. You sit down on the coffee table in front of Ben, you pull your pink hair over your shoulder. You cross your legs, placing your hands in your lap, Steve watches every one of your movements.

“You’re a normie, we know better than to trust your kind. You’re always around, always in our business. You said you didn’t want to join up, so tell me why the fuck are you around us? We need to know the truth and if you can’t give it up, and trust me we’ll know if you’re lying, then we take you to my brothers.” You nod, your tone even. “And if you think this is scary, my brother wants heads to roll for the damage done to me. You’re in the center of everything Ben, you hold responsibility for us being jumped. My brother would love to get his hands on you.” You smirk.

“Fair enough. I accept that.” Ben nods. “I’ll be honest.” He glances from you to Bec’s, Sam sat next to her on the couch behind you.

“Good. Tell me why the fuck you’re constantly around me, the real reason.” Your lips curl in irritation. Ben glances from you to Steve, who nods once.

“Make me a deal. Me and you.” Ben speaks to Steve. Steve’s brow connects.

“My deal is you speak, or I start hitting you.” Steve snorts.

“I tell you, you, you two can’t hit me.” Ben glances at Buck as well.

“Fine.” Steve growls.

“Hold him to it?” Ben looks to you.

“I’ll hold him to it. You lie once, and I let him wail on you till you cry for mercy.” You shrug a shoulder, Steve smirks, clearly on board with this plan.

“Kaine’s obsessed with you. In an unhealthy, really unstable type of way.” Ben nods, leaning forward his elbows on his knees.

“Why?” Steve asks, Ben looks up at him.

“I should start from the beginning.” Ben nods.

The room shifts, everyone on edge about what was going to come to light. Waiting and ready, everything was about to come unhinged.

trail.content_raw:
Pairing: Steve Rogers x Reader!Castle

Warning: Violence. Wish of dying. Mentions of assault. Fighting. Violent past. Stabbing. Hostile anger. Dislike for being touched. Mentions of death. Breaking laws. Revenge/Payback. Defiance in school.

Characters: Steve Rogers. Bucky Barnes. Sam Wilson. Becca Barnes. Frank Castle. Luke Cage. Matt Murdock. Mary MacPherran. Amora Lorelei. Wanda Maximoff. Kaine Parker. Peter Parker. Ben Reilly.
[if you have questions about who some of these Characters are, feel free to ask]

(Half way through I removed the synopsis as it’s longer and annoying to copy over after this long)

Tag List Is Open!!

Make Sure You Read The Warning. Things get ugly from here on out. If you’re not ready for, Mentions of assault. Violence. Or vulgar sexual suggestion.
Stop reading here please and thank you.
Understand this is going to carry on through the rest of the series.

[[MORE]]

The Jeep ride to Barnes Grounds was tense. Steve gripped the wheel tightly, Bec’s didn’t speak, Sam sat in the far back, and Nat had her head on Buck’s shoulder. You adjust your glasses, looking back at your Crew.

“We go to Frank with anything he tells us. Kaine is getting out of hand, he’s going to have to be put down.” You nod. Everyone nods.

“Anyone else having a hard time taking Y/N serious with those magnify glasses on her face?” Sam asks, a faint smirk on his lips. You see Steve chuckle silently, Bec’s hand slips over her mouth, Nat giggles and Buck grins.

“Fuck off. I can’t get my contacts in.” You sigh.

“You look like Steve Urkel’s girlfriend.” Sam chuckles.

“Fuck off.” You shot back turning back around. Steve glances over at you, his lips pressed together as if he was trying to not laugh. You glare at him.

“Careful those things catch the light just right and she’ll fry your ass like an ant on the sidewalk.” Buck laughs. You sigh, throwing up a hand, shaking your head.

“This is why I got contacts.” You mutter.

“I don’t know, she reminds me of one of those hot, nerdy girls. Like she could outwit your ass and break your jaw.” Nat smirks.

“Agreed.” Steve snorts.

“Yeah, remember that Wilson.” You turn glaring at him.

“PFS.” Sam winks at you, you roll your eyes.

“PFS?” Buck looks between the two of you.

“Pretty Fucking Sexy. Or Smart.” Sam shrugs, a goofy grin on his lips. Steve snorts quietly as you turn back around.

“Love you too Sammy.” You shake your head.



You agreed to split up and stash away, so Ben didn’t find all of you sitting in the living room waiting for him. Limiting his chances of bailing or not showing up. Steve hand rested on your hip, as he led you towards the hallway off the kitchen. It put the two of you completely out of view, but the best advancing position.

There was something different in the way Steve touched you. There was more behind it, it meant more between the two of you. He was more protective of you now, whether it was the jumping or the truth about Kaine coming out. He moved as you moved, and he wasn’t far from touching distance unless forced farther.
You lean against one side of the hallway, Steve was leaning across from you.

Blue eyes watched all your movements, you rolled the sleeves on the flannel you wore, you were more or less drowning in material. Steve smirks, something told you he was enjoying watching you in his clothes. But there was something in those blue eyes, something heated, something and it made your knee press together as the throbbing in your belly grew.

“What?” You rasp, watching him, unable to look away. Nerves wrecked your body, this was different for you and Steve, you didn’t get nervous, or shy. Not with your best friend, your partner in crime, your Crew member.

Steve’s eyes cut to the end of the hall. He pushes off the wall, stepping into your personal space. Trapping you between him and the wall. But you didn’t feel trapped, it felt right, you liked it. His head dips before you really could brace yourself. His lips catch yours, his hands slip into your hair. Your hands land on his chest, fingers gripping his T-shirt. Fuck needing pain pills, Steve kissing you made your body numb, you’d never felt such a rush before.

“Why,” you pant when Steve pulls back with a smirk “have we not done that before?” You smirk, flushing.

“You weren’t ready.” Steve brushes a thumb over your cheek.

True, but boy were you ready now.

“You know,” you swallow.

“We have to tell them. I know.” He nods. Your hand reaches up, snatching the ball cap off his head, you flip it around and place it over your messy pink hair. You brush up against him as you move by, he lets out a faint chuckle.

“What?” You glance back.

“Defiantly mine.” He nods, flashing that crooked grin at you.

“Same.” You smirk, your eyes run over him. His black T-shirt and jeans, he was your best friend, but he was more. The two of you knew that, it was clear now, and you’d have to face the Crew with what you were now.

“He’s here.” Bec’s speaks softly in the living room. You nod, turning to face the entrance of the hall. Steve comes over, standing next to you. The door opens, you heard Bec’s suck in a breathe.

“Hey.” Ben sounds cheerful. “You okay?” He stops not far from you and Steve.

“I’m sorry.” Bec’s sniffs. You nod, Steve moves, storming out of the hall.

“Wha-” Ben’s cut off as Steve’s hand closes around his throat, backing him into a wall.

“You’ve got a bit of explaining to do.” Steve growls. You walk out from the hall, into the living room.

“Hello Ben.” You stop once in the living room. Ben’s eyes grow wide, you’d not bothered with make up at the hospital. The guys agreed, yours and Nat’s beating was on him too, he needed to see it all.

“Fuck.” Ben croaks.

“Yes you are.” Buck slides around the corner on his shoulder. Ben swallows hard, his eyes flick around Sam pulls a chair with him, turning it around. Steve drops Ben into it, Buck comes to stand on the other side of Ben, Steve on the other. Nat strolls into the living room, joining the party.

“You just have to tell them what you know.” Bec’s nods, her nose red and eyes blood shot.

“Spill what you know, and they’ll let you go.” Nat nods, sitting down in an arm chair, dramatically crossing her legs.

“Maybe.” Buck growls, his grip on Ben’s shoulder tightens.

“We’ll see.” Steve folds his arms over his chest. “Start singing bird.” His jaw clenches.

“What do you want to know?” Ben swallows. You sit down on the coffee table in front of Ben, you pull your pink hair over your shoulder. You cross your legs, placing your hands in your lap, Steve watches every one of your movements.

“You’re a normie, we know better than to trust your kind. You’re always around, always in our business. You said you didn’t want to join up, so tell me why the fuck are you around us? We need to know the truth and if you can’t give it up, and trust me we’ll know if you’re lying, then we take you to my brothers.” You nod, your tone even. “And if you think this is scary, my brother wants heads to roll for the damage done to me. You’re in the center of everything Ben, you hold responsibility for us being jumped. My brother would love to get his hands on you.” You smirk.

“Fair enough. I accept that.” Ben nods. “I’ll be honest.” He glances from you to Bec’s, Sam sat next to her on the couch behind you.

“Good. Tell me why the fuck you’re constantly around me, the real reason.” Your lips curl in irritation. Ben glances from you to Steve, who nods once.

“Make me a deal. Me and you.” Ben speaks to Steve. Steve’s brow connects.

“My deal is you speak, or I start hitting you.” Steve snorts.

“I tell you, you, you two can’t hit me.” Ben glances at Buck as well.

“Fine.” Steve growls.

“Hold him to it?” Ben looks to you.

“I’ll hold him to it. You lie once, and I let him wail on you till you cry for mercy.” You shrug a shoulder, Steve smirks, clearly on board with this plan.

“Kaine’s obsessed with you. In an unhealthy, really unstable type of way.” Ben nods, leaning forward his elbows on his knees.

“Why?” Steve asks, Ben looks up at him.

“I should start from the beginning.” Ben nods.

The room shifts, everyone on edge about what was going to come to light. Waiting and ready, everything was about to come unhinged.
